metadata.description: Multi-cloud network security resources including AWS Security Groups, NACLs, Transit Gateway, Azure NSGs, GCP Firewall Rules, and Palo Alto firewall configurations

list.name: sg-redis-prod
list.description: Production Redis cache cluster security group

list.name: sg-elasticsearch
list.description: Elasticsearch cluster for logging and search

supported_operations.description: List all security groups with filters
List rules for specific security group
Add inbound rule to security group
Add outbound rule to security group
Remove inbound rule from security group
Remove outbound rule from security group

list.name: allow-https-ingress
list.description: Allow HTTPS traffic from internet to web servers

list.name: allow-http-ingress
list.description: Allow HTTP for redirect to HTTPS

list.name: allow-redis-from-app
list.description: Allow Redis from app and web tiers

list.name: allow-gke-node-to-node
list.description: Allow all traffic between GKE nodes

list.name: allow-gke-master-to-nodes
list.description: Allow GKE master to communicate with nodes

list.name: deny-ssh-public
list.description: Block SSH from internet (use IAP instead)

list.name: allow-prometheus-scrape
list.description: Allow Prometheus to scrape all targets

rules.description: Allow HTTPS inbound to web tier
Application and web to Redis cache
Block malicious IPs from threat intel
